snippet.title: The Age of Decadence Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the trailer and try the demo of our upcoming game, The Age of Decadence.

Download the demo from here: http://www.irontowerstudio.com/forum/index.php/topic,2488.0.html

Learn more about the game on our website: http://www.irontowerstudio.com/

Pre-Order the game: https://secure.bmtmicro.com/servlets/Orders.ShoppingCart?CID=7483&PRODUCTID=74830000

Vote for us on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=93102452

Or follow us in Facebook and Twitter:

http://www.facebook.com/IronTowerStudio

http://twitter.com/IronTowerStudio
